articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.title: Three Adani Group stocks jump up to 5% as Abu Dhabi investor shows interest - The Economic Times
articles.description: TAQA, among the largest integrated utilities in Europe, West Asia and Africa and also the second-largest stock on Abu Dhabi Securities Exchange (ADX), is keen to deploy $1.5-2.5 billion in Adani Group firms or in a single entity, people familiar with the matt…
articles.content: Shares of Adani group firms Adani Green Energy, Adani Energy Solutions and Adani Power jumped up to 12% in Friday's trade on BSE amid reports that Abu Dhabi National Energy Co. PJSC (TAQA) is looking… [+2540 chars]
